posts.post_content:
Jace Beleren finds your community comments boring.  
  
Your fate was sealed the moment he brainstormed, decided to unummon your vaunted Bankslayers, and Sculpt your Mind into a shape he found more amusing. How many sides does a destroyed-agon have? because thats the shape of your mind now.  
  
Best Signature I've ever seen on a forum:  
  
Jace: Just summon the most powerful equipment you can think of.  
Stoneforge: \*summons BANHAMMER  
Jace: NOT THAT ONE! XO  
  
I beg anyone who already has a playset to do the best they can to ruin, destroy and terrorize Extended and Modern like you did Standard. Please just get him a couple more bannings, so I can afford him. I really, really, really freaking want this card. :P

posts.post_content:
since most people probably couldn't understand hollindayz, i'm going to put my two cents in two cents in as to why this card is quite overrated.  
first off, no card will ever, ever, ever win a game on it's own. here's some of the great cards i've come up against and what i played against it.  
[Doomgape](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doomgape) ; [Go For the Throat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Go For the Throat)  
[Baneslayer Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Baneslayer Angel) ; [Dark Banishing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Banishing)  
[Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) ; [Debtor's Knell](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Debtor's Knell)  
Jace TMS ; [Faith's Fetters](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Faith's Fetters)  
no card can ever win by itself. if jace doesn't have creatures or counters to protect him from attacks he's helpless. he has 5 loyalty by your opponent's next turn, more often than not, so all i have to do is do five damage. that's nothing for by green power deck or my red burn deck. easy pickings.  
i've never lost a game to TMS, but i have lost to [Hedron Crab](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hedron Crab), a much cheaper, still legal, much better card.  
if his fir... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

no card can ever win by itself. if jace doesn't have creatures or counters to protect him from attacks he's helpless. he has 5 loyalty by your opponent's next turn, more often than not, so all i have to do is do five damage. that's nothing for by green power deck or my red burn deck. easy pickings.
